name: Nature
slogan: Experience the beauty of the earth

cards.content: The greatest glory in living lies not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.
cards.author: Nelson Mandela

cards.content: In every walk with nature one receives far more than he seeks.
cards.author: John Muir

cards.content: Look deep into nature, and then you will understand everything better.
cards.author: Albert Einstein

cards.content: Nature always wears the colors of the spirit.
cards.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

cards.content: The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.
cards.author: Walt Disney

cards.content: Technology is anything that wasnâ€™t around when you were born.
cards.author: Alan Kay

cards.content: The advance of technology is based on making it fit in so that you don't really even notice it, so it's part of everyday life.
cards.author: Bill Gates

cards.content: The technology you use impresses no one. The experience you create with it is everything.
cards.author: Sean Gerety

cards.content: Your time is limited, don't waste it living someone else's life.
cards.author: Steve Jobs

cards.content: Travel makes one modest. You see what a tiny place you occupy in the world.
cards.author: Gustave Flaubert

cards.content: The world is a book, and those who do not travel read only one page.
cards.author: Saint Augustine

cards.content: A journey of a thousand miles begins with a single step.
cards.author: Lao Tzu

cards.content: Music is the language of the spirit. It opens the secret of life bringing peace, abolishing strife.
cards.author: Kahlil Gibran

cards.content: Music can change the world because it can change people.
cards.author: Bono

cards.content: Without music, life would be a mistake.
cards.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

cards.content: Music gives a soul to the universe, wings to the mind, flight to the imagination, and life to everything.
cards.author: Plato
